text: The East Japan Railway Company () or the JR East is a major passenger railway company in Japan and is the biggest of the seven Japan Railways Group companies. The company's headquarters are in Yoyogi, Yoyogi Station is the next station of Shinjuku Station. Shibuya, Tokyo. It is listed in the Tokyo Stock Exchange.It is also listed on the TOPIX Core30 index and the Nikkei 225 index. ==References== ;Notes Category:1987 establishments in Japan Category:Companies listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange
title: East Japan Railway Company
